Room.Name: East Tunnel Entrance
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the bottom of a wide stairs leading up to the Ladies Walk.
Room.LongDescription: The stairs rise only a few meters and then lead to a broad tunnel going east. The tunnel is open on one side to the castle's courtyard, but several meters above it, providing the women of the castle a nice view of the activities taking place there. Several shoppes are located along the tunnel promanade.
